column4: Hey guys. Im running ubuntu 10.04 (great so far), and would like to know if there is any way to play back HD video (.m2ts, .mkv, etc) or flash video with hardware acceleration. I have an ATI card (radeon 4650) btw. Thanks
with hardware acceleration you will neet to wait to the next version of vlc, 1.2 i believe
thanks, hopefully theres another way to get hardware acceleration
